attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We call upon the government to Professor David Nutt as head of the Advisory Council on the Misuse of Drugs. If scientists are not allowed to engage in the debate at this interface then you devalue their contribution to policy making and undermine a major source of carefully considered and evidence-based advice.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
